Preference: Appearance can be modified by changing the parent block as-described in the below.
NOTE: All lines except 5 bear no fufnction beyond informing the end-user.

Adjustment.First: Extract the contents of this pack, or create a new pack as directory in /resourcepacks/.
Adjustment.Second: Select from either of the following below for the block parent above:

Options.cmp_vt: Vanilla Tweaks' original idea for visual composters. The window therein is taller than cauldron.
Options.cmp_stubby: My modification of the idea which uses the same window height as Cauldron for consistency .
